20110113220842.000|20110113220846.000|CC1|>> THESE ARE PARTICULAR TO DO

20110113220850.000|20110113220853.000|CC1|SPORTS METAPHORS ABOUT POLITICS.

20110113220856.000|20110113220901.000|CC1|THEN ALL OF A SUDDEN, IT'S GUN  
20110113220901.000|20110113220901.000|CC1|PLAY.                           
20110113220901.000|20110113220902.000|CC1|RELOAD.

20110113222546.000|20110113222548.000|CC1|      A SIMPLER WAY TO SHIP.    
20110113222548.000|20110113222548.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110113222548.000|20110113222549.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110113222549.000|20110113222551.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110113222551.000|20110113222551.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110113222551.000|20110113222555.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110113222555.000|20110113222555.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110113222555.000|20110113222557.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110113222557.000|20110113222559.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110113222559.000|20110113222601.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110113222601.000|20110113222601.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110113222601.000|20110113222603.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110113222603.000|20110113222603.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110113222603.000|20110113222605.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110113222605.000|20110113222605.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110113222605.000|20110113222607.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110113222607.000|20110113222609.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110113222609.000|20110113222609.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110113222609.000|20110113222611.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110113222611.000|20110113222611.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110113222611.000|20110113222613.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110113222613.000|20110113222613.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110113222613.000|20110113222616.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110113222616.000|20110113222616.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110113222616.000|20110113222619.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110113222619.000|20110113222619.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110113222619.000|20110113222620.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110113222620.000|20110113222620.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110113222620.000|20110113222622.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110113222622.000|20110113222624.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110113222624.000|20110113222624.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110113222624.000|20110113222626.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110113222626.000|20110113222626.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110113222626.000|20110113222628.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110113222628.000|20110113222629.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110113222629.000|20110113222629.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110113222629.000|20110113222631.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110113222631.000|20110113222631.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110113222631.000|20110113222633.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110113222633.000|20110113222633.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110113222633.000|20110113222636.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110113222636.000|20110113222637.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110113222637.000|20110113222637.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110113222637.000|20110113222640.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110113222640.000|20110113222640.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110113222640.000|20110113222642.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110113222642.000|20110113222642.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110113222642.000|20110113222644.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110113222644.000|20110113222644.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110113222644.000|20110113222646.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110113222646.000|20110113222646.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110113222646.000|20110113222648.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110113222648.000|20110113222648.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110113222648.000|20110113222651.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110113222651.000|20110113222652.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110113222652.000|20110113222654.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110113222654.000|20110113222654.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110113222654.000|20110113222656.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110113222656.000|20110113222656.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110113222656.000|20110113222659.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110113222659.000|20110113222659.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110113222659.000|20110113222720.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.
